channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unlicensed ground anchor, 28th June
item.description:
Fronting no. 20 All Saints Road, Cheltenham GL52 2EZ, there has been an unlicensed ground anchor to secure bicycles on the footway fronting the property. Having bicycles parked on the footway creates an obstruction for all users of the highway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, All Saints' Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Still massive pothole, 28th June
item.description:
Despite myself (and others) being notified that this pothole has been repaired - IT HAS NOT!!! I got an email on 25th June to say it was fixed the previous day. This is a photo from 27th June - it is still there!!! Although it does have a little bit of white paint on it. Don't close the report until you've actually fixed it!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 28th June
item.description:
Permanent traffic lights have been hit and twisted 90 degrees. Customer is worried that the lights have an arrow that looks just a green light with the lights twisted in this direction. . 247 of 28/06/2024.

item.title: Growing pothole outside 2 Campden Road, 28th June
item.description:
Outside 2 Campden Rd is a large and growing pothole mainly because someone parks directly opposite it is now impossible to avoid. Each time someone drives through it it just gets bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Campden Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
